unnormalised: Arre baba, insurance policies can be such a headache, no? My chacha bought a Jeevan Bima Policy from LIC for ₹5 lakh back in '05. He thought he was all set for retirement. But now, with inflation and all, ₹5L doesn't seem like much, does it? He should have gone for a higher sum assured, maybe around Rs. 20,00,000. And he only took it for 15 yrs! Should have preponed his retirement planning.
